SELECT mid2.uid , mid2.created_at, mid2.updated_at, mid2.deleted_flag, mid2.used_flag, mid2.market_item_uid, mid2.item_buy_uid, mid2.sell_flag, ib.item_uid, i.image_uri, mi.price, mi.price / usd.base_price AS usd_price, mi.price / usd.base_price / fog.price AS fog_price, mi.quantity, mi.current_quantity, CONCAT('#',ib.`index`) AS index_name, ib.`index`, i.member_uid FROM market_item_detail mid2 LEFT OUTER JOIN market_item mi ON mid2.market_item_uid = mi.uid AND mi.deleted_flag = false AND mi.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN item_buy ib ON mid2.item_buy_uid = ib.uid AND ib.deleted_flag = false AND ib.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN item AS i ON ib.item_uid = i.uid AND i.deleted_flag = false AND i.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN exchange usd ON usd.code = 'FRX.KRWUSD' AND usd.deleted_flag = false AND usd.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN exchange_virtual2 fog on fog.name = 'FOGnet_USD' AND fog.deleted_flag = false AND fog.used_flag = true WHERE mid2.deleted_flag = false AND mid2.used_flag = true AND mid2.sell_flag = false AND mi.current_quantity > 0 AND mi.minting_status = 1
AND mid2.market_item_uid = #{marketItemUid}
AND mid2.uid IN
#{uid}
ORDER BY mi.price , mid2.uid DESC
ORDER BY mi.price DESC, mid2.uid DESC
ORDER BY mid2.uid DESC
